title: On the radio
author: VD
content_html:
In case you’re interested in listening, I’ll be on the Jerry Hughes show at 4 PM EST today, unfortunately minus Mr. Hughes this time. I’m hoping we can spend most of the time taking questions while discussing the economy; the call-in number is 866-222-2368.

On two unrelated notes, does anyone have a PDF of Keynes’s General Theory? There’s no shortage of HTML versions available, but I’d prefer a good PDF with footnotes. And if there is good Windows install app programmer among the Ilk who is interested in a small contract job, email me for details along with short descriptions of your two best projects. Educational history not needed but some ability with layouts and 2D graphics is a plus.
content_text:
In case you’re interested in listening, I’ll be on
the Jerry Hughes show at 4 PM EST today
, unfortunately minus Mr. Hughes this time.  I’m hoping we can spend most of the time taking questions while discussing the economy; the call-in number is 866-222-2368.
On two unrelated notes,
does anyone have a PDF of Keynes’s General Theory?  There’s no shortage of HTML versions available, but I’d prefer a good PDF with footnotes.
And if there is good Windows install app programmer among the Ilk who is interested in a small contract job, email me for details along with short descriptions of your two best projects.  Educational history not needed but some ability with layouts and 2D graphics is a plus.
